title: Ticket #3937: Improve "condor_status -submitters" output
description:
I'd like to see "condor_status -submitters" improved to contain additional columns of information.

The OSG submit node has a small webpage which summarizes current usage; see: http://osg-xsede.grid.iu.edu/monitoring/condor-report/

I'd like the information captured in the second table ("Users") to be part of the standard "condor_status -submitters" output. In particular, the following is missing:

  • Recent number of job starts.
  • Recent number of shadow starts.
  • Recent image size (memory usage).
  • Recent average job run time.
  • Recent average job data transfer.
  • Recent average data rate. Probably doing the averages over 1 hour is sufficient. I've CC'd Mats Rynge so he can provide details about the current OSG implementation.

The "-wide" option doesn't seem to work well with the second table; we should also fix that.
